channel.title: Development on Brett Goss
channel.description: Recent content in Development on Brett Goss

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Brett Goss. I used to make coffee, and now I write code. I graduated from Lighthouse Labs in December of 2016, and spent the next six months working for an agency in Victoria, BC called PurposeSocial. During that time, I worked primarily with Sitka Surf Co. to rebuild their online Shopify Store, with a focus on both mobile and desktop usability, as well as improving conversions. I have more side projects than I’d like to admit - the most notable of which is Plantia: a web app for keeping track of your houseplants’ watering schedules.
